name: Super Sky Sluggers
description:
Play as a sky slugger and fight off the sky pirate attack. Steal their artifacts and defeat their boss to win.

Use the mouse to move and hold left click to fire. Collect artifacts, shoot pirates, and avoid being shrunk or enlarged to not become an easier target.

This is a game that was mainly made in 24 hours with some touch ups after the 24 hours

A game created by Team Jumbo
